messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] A rebuttal to the Time magazine article
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/29/2001 11:39:51 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... He certainly isn t an unschooling dad. . . very much into results and being up or above
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/29/2001 11:39:51 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
saninocencio@... writes:


> http://www.washtimes.com/op-ed/20010823-76808354.htm
>

He certainly isn't an unschooling dad. . . very much into "results" and being
up or above grade level.

lovemary

Master your responses to external events--don't attempt to control them






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: A rebuttal to the Time magazine article
messages.msgSnippet: This was posted on another group and I though you folks would like to see a journalist approving of homeschool. ... Johanna Life is the ultimate learning
messages.messageBody:
This was posted on another group and I though you folks would like to see a
journalist approving of homeschool.
> The Assistant National Editor of the Washington Times is a
> homeschooling dad with something to say about the Time article.
>
> http://www.washtimes.com/op-ed/20010823-76808354.htm
>
>

Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!
